item.title: Departed's Legacy Client GameFrame. [Read]
item.dc:creator: @Valhalla95 Valhalla95
item.description:
@Valhalla95 wrote:

[quote=“k a h leader, post:1, topic:201620”]Please post positive feedback, alot of you may know I released a server awhile ago and got alot of good feedback on it and alot of people are waiting for the next release.

I am releasing another client to go with the release and I just want to show you guys what I have been working on.

I JUST started the gameframe today and have only been working with it for a little bit, please post feedback on what you think…

No this isn’t leeched, part of it is from Ricscape old sprites but that is it.

When its done it will have everything mine, nothing from anybody.

I will also be posting skill icons I made.

If you wish to contact me to do a sprite of any kind to make it look cool or demonic, emo, metal whatever you want to call it.

Please feel free to private message me.

anyways here is the small sample

Here is the first version

Here is the first version with colors inverted to PROVE I didn’t just invert colors on paint, hmm do the colors look like an earlier client? NOPE.

Zoltanman = Retarded for thinking I inverted

Here is red Second version

Here is Grey Second version

The gray version is basicly me deleting the color out of the pic, but that is basicly what it would look like.[/quote]

Not Bad for your second client & server, but you shouldnt make it so ppl can sue it with other p. servers so make it like when u run it u cant change the IP, this makes your server IP ping to the client and say usernamer
password
Cancle Enter

item.title: Departed's Legacy Client GameFrame. [Read]

item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Im going to be blunt with you. I do not like it currently. I dont like the colour’s at all, and it would be difficult to read. Im not flameing you, im giving you Constructive criticism so yu can improve. I dont really like Gilo’s sprites except for Dragon Req, so mayby that factors in a bit.
